author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CATASTROPHIC WINDS, FLASH FLOODING, AND STORM SURGE ONGOING IN JAMAICA... ...MELISSA REMAINS A POWERFUL CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE OVER NORTHWESTERN JAMAICA...
summary: ...CATASTROPHIC WINDS, FLASH FLOODING, AND STORM SURGE ONGOING IN JAMAICA... ...MELISSA REMAINS A POWERFUL CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE OVER NORTHWESTERN JAMAICA... As of 4:00 PM EDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Melissa was located near 18.4, -77.9 with movement NNE at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 914 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 150 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
